content.rendered:
Market Dimension Business Class Economy Class
Between Europe and Africa up to 158 cm
(w+h+d)		 2 Pieces, @ 32 kg each 1 Piece, @ 23kg each
Between Windhoek & Cape Town, Johannesburg, Luanda up to 158 cm
(w+h+d)		 2 Pieces, @ 32 kg each 2 Pieces, @ 23kg each
ERJ Operated Destinations up to 158 cm
(w+h+d)		 not applicable 1 Piece, @ 23kg each
Marine / Seamen on all Namibia operated routes up to 158 cm
(w+h+d)		 2 Pieces, @ 23 kg each 2 Pieces, @ 32kg each
  •   Business Class passengers are allowed 2 pieces of 32kgs (70lbs) each whose three dimensions shall not exceed a total of 158cms (62 inches) (L+W+H) for each bag.
  • Economy class passengers are allowed 1 piece of 23kgs (50lbs) whose total dimensions shall not exceed 158cms (62 inches) (L+W+H) for each bag.
  • For ease of handling, the maximum weight of each piece of baggage shall not exceed 32 Kgs(70 lbs)

For more details visit : https://www.Air Namibia .com.lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Namibia Excess Baggage

Air Namibia Hand | Cabin Baggage
